newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Nanshan Power 1996 net surges 88 pct.
newsitem.headline: Nanshan Power 1996 net surges 88 pct.

text.p: (in millions of yuan unless stated, against 1995 figures)
Earnings per share 0.359 yuan vs 0.245 yuan
Net assets per share 2.79 yuan vs 2.73 yuan
Company name: Shenzhen Nanshan Power Station Co Ltd.

Note: The results, compiled under Chinese accounting standards except for net profits which were based on international standards, were published in an annual report in the Shenzhen-based Securities Times on Monday.
Based on Chinese standards, the company posted net profits of 71.11 million yuan for 1996 against 48.43 million yuan in 1995.
The company's board of directors have proposed a cash dividend of 0.30 yuan per share based on 1996 profits, pending approval of shareholders at a meeting on May 31.
Trading in Nanshan's A and B shares was suspended on Monday morning and will resume in the afternoon, according to the Shenzhen Stock Exchange.
